info.title: Source Map Class
info.description: Loads a library map index file and reads all the elements.

prop.name: folderPath
prop.description: The folder path of the file.

parameter.name: $folderPath
parameter.description: The folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $mapFile
parameter.description: The map file name. By default the MAP_FILE constant is used.

method.name: getLibraryList
method.description: Gets all libraries in the map file.
method.returndescription: An array of all libraries by key and value.

method.name: getPackageList
method.description: Get all packages in the given library from the map file.
method.returndescription: An array of all packages in the library.

method.name: getNSList
method.description: Get all namespaces in the given package.

parameter.name: $parentNs
parameter.description: The parent namespace (separated by "::", if any).

method.returndescription: A nested array of all namespaces.

method.name: getObjectList
method.description: Get all objects in the map, in the given library, package and namespace.

parameter.name: $parentNs
parameter.description: The namespace (separated by "::", if any). The default value is null, which will select all objects in the package at any depth. If is set to an empty string (""), it will select all objects as children of the package at depth 1.

method.returndescription: An array of all items. An item is an array of object information, including title, name, library, package and namespace.
